title: On Rahul Gandhi's "Shoes" Charge At Amit Shah, A Massive Political Fight - NDTV
content:
1. On Rahul Gandhi's "Shoes" Charge At Amit Shah, A Massive Political Fight  NDTV
  2. Rahul Gandhi Demands Apology From HM Amit Shah For Forcing Manipur Politicians To Remove Their Shoes  India Today
  3. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Rahul Gandhi's charge today that a group of politicians from Manipur was forced to remove their shoes at Union Home Minister Amit Shah's home provoked angry reactions from the ruling BJP.
